title: Possible Unban Account DarkysChannel
body: I spent 300 euros on that account and i dont want that this account is permabanned so please riot games forgive me i just had bad games diddnt flame bud give the ansvers to my mates please unban me will never hapen again

replies.body: Unfortunately, I can't bring great news. Accounts are only unbanned when the ban was issued in error, and your "second chance" is the chance to reform after a 14-day ban.

> please unban me will never hapen again

You got permbanned, which is basically proof you are incapable of correcting your behavior.

If losing your investment is the only thing that makes you reconsider, we really dont need you. Bye.
